author: nd
msg: exit(1) should never occur in any module. Stay away from it.

author: nd
msg: REWRITELOCK_MODE wasn't used anymore for ages. In the meantime it defined
the mode of the rewritelog (sic!) file. So fix the misnaming and
use constants for mode and open flags.

author: slive
msg: Add some documentation on upgrading from one minor version to the next.

author: nd
msg: use sizeof where sizeof should be used.
